title: Cure Group

properties.name: description
properties.value: Cure Group is a spell in the lunar spellbook requiring the Lunar Diplomacy quest and 74 Magic to use. It functions similarly to the Cure Me spell; curing poison from all players within 1 square radius of the caster. Players must have Accept Aid turned on to benefit from this spell.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Cure Group
Cure Group
Released 24 July 2006 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 74
Spellbook Lunar
Type Combat
Experience 74
Runes 2 2 2
Description Cure poison on players
Animation
Sound Effect

Cure Group is a spell in the lunar spellbook requiring the Lunar Diplomacy quest and 74 Magic to use. It functions similarly to the Cure Me spell; curing poison from all players within 1 square radius of the caster. Players must have Accept Aid turned on to benefit from this spell.

This spell is used by clans and pking teams and is useful for Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup, the TzHaar Fight Pit, or other team-based activities.

Cost[edit | edit source]

Spell cost

[[File:Cure Group icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Cure Group''' is a [[spell]] in the [[lunar spellbook]] requiring the [[Lunar Diplomacy]] [[quest]] and 74 [[Magic]] to use. It functions similarly to the [[Cure Me]] spell; curing poison from all [[player]]s within 1 square radius of the caster. Players must have '''Accept Aid''' turned on to benefit from this spell.

This spell is used by [[clan]]s and [[pking]] teams and is useful for [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]], the [[TzHaar Fight Pit]], or other team-based activities.

==Cost==
